attributes.title: Castle Black
attributes.religion: The Old Gods of the Forest<br />The Faith of the Seven

sections.Notable residents:
* Lord Commander {[[Jeor Mormont]]}, commander of the Night's Watch. Murdered by Rast during the [[Mutiny at Craster's Keep|mutiny]] at [[Craster's Keep]].
** [[Jon Snow]], called "Lord Snow", personal steward of Lord Commander Mormont.
* [[Maester]] [[Aemon]], once known asÂ Aemon Targaryen, former heir to the [[Iron Throne]] and resident maesterÂ of Castle Black
* [[Benjen Stark]], First Ranger of the Night's Watch. Missing in action and presumed dead.
** {[[Othor]]}, {[[Jafer Flowers]]}, Ranger's in Benjen's scouting party. Killed and raised as [[Wights]].
** Ser {[[Waymar Royce]]}, {[[Gared]]}. Killed by [[White Walkers]].
**{[[Will]]}, a Ranger and deserter of the Watch. Executed by Lord [[Eddard Stark]].
** {[[Karl Tanner]]}, a former cutthroat and ranger. Leader of the [[Betrayers|Mutineers]]. Killed by Jon Snow during the [[Raid on Craster's Keep|raid]] on Craster's Keep.
** {[[Grenn]]}, a newly graduated Ranger. Killed fightingÂ [[Mag Mar Tun Doh Weg]] during the [[Battle of Castle Black]].
** {[[Rast]]} a newly graduated Ranger, one of the [[Betrayers|Mutineers]] of the Night's Watch.Â Killed by [[Ghost]] following the [[Raid on Craster's Keep|raid]] on Craster's Keep.
* [[Bowen Marsh]], First Steward of the Night's Watch.
** [[Eddison Tollett]], steward.Â 
** {[[Pypar]]}, steward. Killed by [[Ygritte]] during the [[Battle of Castle Black]].
** [[Samwell Tarly]], steward.Â 
* Ser [[Alliser Thorne]], former master-at-arms of Castle Black. Sent to King's Landing to gather recruits. Made Acting Lord Commander upon his return.
*[[Othell Yarwyck]], First Builder of the Night's Watch.
*Lord [[Janos Slynt]], former Commander of the [[City Watch]] of King's Landing and Lord of [[Harrenhal]], occupying a senior position in an unofficial manner.
* {[[Yoren]]}, a [[Wandering Crows|recruiter]] for the Watch, rarely at Castle Black. Killed by Ser [[Amory Lorch]] in the [[Riverlands]].
*[[Olly]], a child who survived a [[Wilding|wildling]] raid on his village, sent by [[Styr]] to warn the Night's Watch about their arrival. After which he stays at Castle Black with the [[Night's Watch]].

{{Quote|I found it surprisingly beautiful. In a brutal, horribly uncomfortable sort of way.|[[Tyrion Lannister]] to [[Janos Slynt]]|The Night Lands}}  
[[Image:NineteenCastlesOnTheWall.jpg|thumb|200px|Castle Black, near the center of the Wall]][[Image:Castle Black Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|The location of [[Castle Black]] on the continent of [[Westeros]].]]
'''Castle Black''' is the primary headquarters andÂ redoubt of the [[Night's Watch]]. It is located roughly halfway along the length of [[the Wall]] on its southern side, at the northern end of the [[Kingsroad]]. It is a dark and chilling home to its garrison.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/castle-black/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Castle Black entry]</ref>

Castle Black is one of only three manned castles left on [[the Wall]] along with [[Eastwatch-by-the-Sea]] and [[The Shadow Tower]]. There are nineteen castles along the Wall, but as their numbers fell over the centuries the Night's Watch had to abandon sixteen of them. Castle Black is located between the unmanned castles of Queensgate and Oakensheild.

Castle Black has a sept, but no [[Godswood]]. Those who are followers of the [[Old Gods of the Forest]] must travel a mile [[Beyond the Wall|north]] of the Wall and into the [[Haunted Forest]] to take their vows before a [[heart tree]].
